dialogueLines.dialogueText: Well, if it isn't the new bar owner. Delighted to meet you, darling.
I'm Mirage the Marvelous, the most talented magician you'll ever meet.
Oh, him? This is my assistant, Ace. Every magician needs an assistant.
I heard you're looking for entertainers, but I'm afraid we can't be of help. You can't afford us.
In fact, we're here to stop you from stealing Granny's business. So, shall we hash it out?
